companydetail.Title: Msk Cashews
companydetail.Date: MSK Cashew is a leading provider of high-quality cashew nuts sourced from the finest cashew farms from Panruti. We take pride in delivering premium cashew products to our customers.
Description: Our commitment to quality, sustainability, and customer satisfaction sets us apart. We work closely with local farmers and ensure fair trade practices.

companydetail.Title: Frontend developer
Description: Collaborated with designers and back-end developers to create responsive and user-friendly web experiences.
